committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to abolish the quadrennial Commission on executive, legislative, and judicial salaries established by section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the abolishment of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries established under the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the quadrennial Commission on executive, legislative, and judicial salaries established by section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, and for other purposes.
